column4: so, I will ask again as a fair piece of time has past: anyone run into a problem after upgrading to kernel 2.6.24-21 loading nvidia-glx drivers?

it seems that the nvidia driver is not loading.  I've checked Xorg.0.log for errors but can't find any.  When I boot back to 2.6.24-19 the nvidia drivers load as expected.  NOTE: I installed from apt nvidia-glx-new
I am as well using GeForce 7600 Go
and you have not trouble with the upgrade to -21?
